entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY , Nain
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:53 AM AST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -4.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Nain Airport 12:00 PM AST Wednesday 18 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -4.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.1 kPa falling
Visibility: 3.2 km
Humidity: 90 %
Wind Chill: -12
Dewpoint: -5.9°C
Wind: NW 26 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 12 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Snow ending before morning then cloudy. Blowing snow overnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 50 gusting to 80 near midnight. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Clearing. Temperature steady near minus 12.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Blowing snow over exposed areas early in the morning. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 80 becoming north 40 gusting to 60 near noon. Temperature steady near minus 12. Wind chill near minus 26. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 19. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy periods with 40 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 19. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Wednesday 18 January 2023
